cu.explanation_en: Setting remote_s_portc to a negative value (-1) will cause invalid port configuration and F1 interface failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid TDD configuration and transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成傳輸失敗。
